title: Use of subcontractors
subtitle1: Indicate if a supplier can use subcontractors to complete the work needed for your project.In some instances suppliers may already work with subcontractors to help  deliver a project's need.
subtitle2: Your contract will be with the supplier and they will be responsible for making sure any subcontractors perform as expected.

hint.text: A supplier can use subcontractors to complete the work needed on my project
A supplier can't use subcontractors to complete the work needed on my project
